import React from'react';import{Typography,Paper,List,ListItem,ListItemText,ListItemButton}from'@mui/material';import{Link as RouterLink}from'react-router-dom';import MainLayout from'../layouts/MainLayout';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QA=()=>{const articles=[{title:'Playwright: Начало работы',path:'/qa/playwright/getting-started',description:'Основы работы с Playwright для автоматизации тестирования веб-приложений'}// Здесь будут добавлены другие статьи
];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MainLayout,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:"QA \u0438 \u0410\u0432\u0442\u043E\u043C\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0437\u0430\u0446\u0438\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paper,{elevation:3,sx:{p:3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{children:articles.map(article=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{disablePadding:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemButton,{component:RouterLink,to:article.path,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:article.title,secondary:article.description})})},article.path))})})]});};export default QA;
